item.title: Koofr
item.description:
ðŸ§  Why protecting Koofr matters

Even privacy-first cloud storage like Koofr is vulnerable to risks beyond its control. Accidental deletions, silent corruption, ransomware, or account lockout can result in permanent data loss. Native versioning and sync features help, but they donâ€™t guarantee recovery from every scenario especially when compliance, audits, or long-term retention are required.

Without immutable, externalized backups, your Koofr data remains exposed to operational mistakes and targeted attacks.
